# Hide the Corpse: Features and Fun Galore! #

Race Against Time!
Lift, manipulate, and get messy to hide the corpse before the cops arrive. Don’t get caught!

**[BE SMART & CREATIVE]**
{3651171388479925}
Under the bed? Too simple. In a time machine? Now that's creative!

**[WILD PHYSICS]**
{270931549435552}
Embrace the chaos! Throw stuff around and work against the ticking clock.

**[IMPROVE YOUR STRATEGY]**
{415290244704316}
Revisit and explore various hiding spots to perfect your approach.

**[SURPRISING LEVELS]**
{2171276666564998}
Navigate through bizarre and unexpected scenarios.


# KEY FEATURES: #

Time-limited sessions: You have 4 minutes to outsmart the cops!

Crazy hiding spots: Get creative with where you stash the body.

Outsmart the cops: Use your wits to evade capture.

Interactive environments: Manipulate objects and uncover hidden surprises.

Physics-based challenges: Experience unique physics in multiple areas.

Personalized gameplay: Will you take the obvious route or challenge yourself with tougher spots?

Hurry up—the cops are coming!



# Early Access Dev Description #

**Why is Early Access?**

The aim is to gather feedback from players in order to improve the game.

**How long do you plan to stay in early access?**

3 to 4 months, we'll be adding content regularly until we reach MASTER.

**What is your pricing strategy?**

Meta App Lab: $ 9.99 - $ 13.99 - $ 15.99
Full price for final game: $19.99
